      • Machine

        public Machine​(int id,
               java.lang.String name,
               int point,
               int stone,
               int wood,
               int knowledge,
               int tiles,
               int stoneProd,
               int woodProd,
               int knowledgeProd,
               int tilesProd)
        Constructor of Worker object
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the card
        name - the name of the card
        point - the number of points won at the end of the constrcution of the machine
        stone - the number of stone for the construction of the machine
        wood - the number of wood for the construction of the machine
        knowledge - the number of knowledge for the construction of the machine
        tiles - the number of tiles for the construction of the machine
        stoneProd - the number of stone produced by the machine
        woodProd - the number of wood produced by the worker
        knowledgeProd - the number of knowledge produced by the worker
        tilesProd - the number of tiles produced by the worker
